spec_data.Name: ghc-scotty
spec_data.Description:
A Haskell web framework inspired by Ruby's Sinatra, using WAI and Warp.

Scotty is the cheap and cheerful way to write RESTful, declarative web
applications.

* A page is as simple as defining the verb, url pattern, and Text content.
* It is template-language agnostic. Anything that returns a Text value will do.
* Conforms to WAI Application interface.
* Uses very fast Warp webserver by default.

As for the name: Sinatra + Warp = Scotty.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Wed 01 Mar 2017 12:23:06 PM EST, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
